translations.addnest: Add your Nest Project configuration into Google Nest in Settings.
translations.addsounds2: Add sounds using Server Menu, File Upload
translations.addtasks: Add at least one task to save this action
translations.adduserforldap: Add a user under Users before enabling LDAP
translations.aiconfigfailed: Error from AI Server - check logs and that AI server is running
translations.aiconfigselect: Remember to add some objects to look for
translations.aiconfigwarning: Configure AI Server in Server Settings - AI Settings
translations.aiinfo_alpr_description: Detects and reads licence plates using YOLO object detection and the PaddleOCR toolkit
translations.aiinfo_backgroundremover_description: Automatically removes the background from a picture
translations.aiinfo_faceprocessing_description: A number of Face image APIs including detect, recognize, and compare
translations.aiinfo_objectdetectionnet_description: Provides Object Detection using YOLOv5 ONNX models with DirectML. This module is best for those on Windows and Linux without CUDA enabled GPUs
translations.aiinfo_objectdetectionyolo_description: Provides Object Detection using YOLOv5 v6.2 library with support for CPUs and CUDA enabled GPUs
translations.aiinfo_ocr_description: Provides OCR support using the PaddleOCR toolkit
translations.aiinfo_sceneclassifier_description: Classifies an image according to one of 80 pre-trained scenes
translations.aiinfo_superresolution_description: Increases the resolution of an image using AI
translations.aiinfo_textsummary_description: Summarizes text content by selecting a number of sentences that are most representitive of the content
translations.aiinfo_yolov5-3.1_description: Provides Object Detection using YOLOv5 v3.1 library with support for CPUs and CUDA enabled GPUs. This option is best for those with older CUDA 10.2 and below GPUs
translations.aineedaudiofile2: Agent DVR needs to download a model file for Audio Recognition.
translations.aineedconfig: You need to configure an AI server in server settings to use this feature
translations.ainotresponding: AI server not available - See Server Settings - AI Settings
translations.areahelp: Add areas using the camera detector settings
translations.blockedip2:
Remote access blocked (External IP: [IPADDRESS]).
See Pricing for remote access options.
For access over the local network use a private (LAN) IP address. Valid private IP addresses are:

  • 10.0.0.0 to 10.255.255.255
  • 172.16.0.0 to 172.31.255.255
  • 192.168.0.0 to 192.168.255.255
translations.blockedlicense2: See Remote Access for instructions on connecting remotely.
translations.blockedprotected: Uncheck Protect API in server settings - local server or provide Basic Authentication using an admin user account.
translations.blockedsslonly: You have SSLOnly set to true in Media/XML/Config.json and this is a non-secure request. If you're unable to access via SSL then stop the Agent DVR service and set SSLOnly to false in the JSON file and restart it.
translations.blockedunauthorised: You need to provide a login for remote access
translations.blockedunauthorisedusers: Add a local user account via server settings - users and retry
translations.blockeduser: For remote access you must add at least one user to Server Settings - Users.
translations.cameraloginfailed: Camera login failed. Check username and password
translations.cannotarchive: Cannot archive - check archive directory in server settings - storage
translations.cloudconfigfailed: Error from Cloud provider - check logs
translations.cloudconfigwarning: Authorise Cloud provider in Server Settings
translations.configuresms: (Requires SMS credits) Drop leading 0, include country code eg for Australia: 61410123456
translations.configuresmtp: Subscribe or configure SMTP in server settings
translations.detectorconfigwarning: See the Detector tab or Actions to setup an alert trigger
translations.detectorenabledwarning: Detector is disabled - enable it on the Detector tab

translations.detectortypewarning: Make sure you have a detector or an action configured to trigger alerts

translations.headers.help: eg Content-Type: application/json. New line separated

translations.json.accesssessiontimeoutminutes.help: Set a time limit for people accessing your server via permissions (minutes). 0 = unlimited

translations.json.actions.help: Specify actions to take when events are detected
translations.json.adaptivedefaultframerate.help: Time between video frames when no motion is detected (s). Adaptive Encode mode only
translations.json.addtask.help: You can use the tags {ID}, {OT}, {FILENAME}, {CURRENT_RECORDING}, {MSG}, {NAME}, {GROUPS}, {LOCATION}, {AI} (AI detected objects),{AIJSON}, {BASE64IMAGE}, {ZONE} and a time format string like {0:H:mm:ss} here
translations.json.addtodatabase.help: Prompt to add URL to database when adding cameras

translations.json.ai_modelsdirectory.help: The path to the folder containing model files
translations.json.ai_poststartpause.help: The number of seconds to pause after starting this module. This provides initialisation time
translations.json.ai_processes.help: The number of concurrent execution units (threads, tasks, processes - depends on the module and language) to launch. Default of 0 means Number of CPUs - 1
translations.json.ai_usecuda.help: Whether or not to use CUDA if available

translations.json.aiobjectrecognition.help: This uses an AI server to recognize objects and generate events

translations.json.aiusevideo.help: Send a short video (5 seconds) instead of an image - Gemini only
translations.json.alertmode.help: Trigger an alert when activity is detected, not detected or via Actions
translations.json.alertnumber.help: Number of objects required to trigger alert

translations.json.apiid.help: If you've created an API key to access your account (optional)
translations.json.apipassword.help: Require password to access the API over the local network (may break some integrations)

translations.json.archivegrabslocation.help: Directory to archive photos to eg: D:\archive\{DIR}\{0:dd}\grabs

translations.json.area.help: Click and drag out an area
translations.json.armdelay.help: The time to delay before arming the alerts system (seconds)

translations.json.autofontsize.help: Use an appropriate font size for video width

translations.json.bindinterface.help: Enter an IP address or * to listen on all
translations.json.blockexternalaccess.help: Blocks access from the remote web portal.

translations.json.centerimages.help: Maintain video aspect ratio or fill available space
translations.json.checkcorners.help: Agent DVR checks the center point of the object against the zone. It can also check around this point to match zones - specify a percentage of the distance from the center point to the bounding box corners to enable

translations.json.codecdefault.help: Codec to use for writing files/ streams and the default for cameras

translations.json.configureaiphotos.help: Photo, FTP, label and cropping options
translations.json.connectiontimeout.help: Time in milliseconds to Timeout network connections
translations.json.content.help: Allow access to recordings and photos.
translations.json.controls.help: Record/ Photo etc. Only applies if Read-Only.
translations.json.culturecode.help: The culture code to use when rendering timestamps. See Culture Codes eg: en-US

translations.json.defaultlanguage.help: Sets the language to use in image overlays

translations.json.detailmode.help: Low is cheaper to use than high and fine for most scenarios

translations.json.detectoradvanced.help: The red highlighted areas indicate detected motion

translations.json.devicemanagementheader.help: See Server Settings - Storage for managing media locations
translations.json.digitalzoom.help: Digital PTZ via touch or mouse wheel.

translations.json.encodegpu.help: Index of the GPU to use on your system (if you have multiple)

translations.json.experimentalfeatures.help: Generally only used for testing new functionality

translations.json.recordurl.help: High resolution URL for direct recording (optional)
translations.json.reducesize.help: Reduce the resolution of the recording (to save space)
translations.json.regionmatch.help: Trigger only if the area of movement overlaps the area an object is identified. Requires a tracking detector
translations.json.rename.help: Upload a temporary file and rename
translations.json.reolink.help: This requires a compatible Reolink camera with motion/ AI support via CGI.
translations.json.reolinkpoll.help: How often to poll the camera (seconds)
translations.json.reordersize.help: Higher values = less errors but more memory usage
translations.json.repeattimeout.help: Time in seconds before this can repeat
translations.json.resetinterval.help: Time to reset after an alert is raised in the group (seconds)
translations.json.resetmode.help: Reset alert state after an interval or an idle timeout
translations.json.resizemode.help: Resize images before sending them to the AI server. Smaller will use less CPU but is less accurate
translations.json.reverse.help: Use for fast moving objects like cars
translations.json.rotatedelay.help: Time between switching cameras in interval mode (seconds)
translations.json.rtmpserver.help: The server to use when live streaming. Add RTMP servers in server settings
translations.json.rtmpservers2.help: Stream your video to streaming sites like YouTube and Twitch. Requires a license.
translations.json.rtspportoverride.help: Override the RTSP port (for external access). 0 = automatic
translations.json.rtspsource.help: Try this if you can't access the camera with the Network Camera video source. (H264 or MJPEG only)
translations.json.schedule.help: See the General tab to enable/ disable the schedule
translations.json.schedulemode.help: Set a specific date or select days for a weekly schedule. Clear the date to use days instead
translations.json.scheduleswitch.help: To apply on start, check the option in Server Settings
translations.json.sections.help: Control which UI elements are available
translations.json.sensitivity.help: This controls how much motion triggers the motion detector. You can also adjust this using the scheduler
translations.json.server.help: See Server Settings to add FTP Servers
translations.json.servername.help: Note: Changing the server name may affect any permissions you have assigned to other people
translations.json.servertimeout.help: Time to wait before disconnecting unresponsive clients (milliseconds)
translations.json.showlogo.help: Upload a logo for branding from the server menu
translations.json.showremote.help: Show menu options for remote access via the ispyconnect website
translations.json.signalrlogging.help: Enables logging of the SignalR connection (for debugging)
translations.json.signalrmethod.help: SignalR connect method (for debugging). Default is All
translations.json.signalrwait.help: Wait for connection from remote webservices at startup (can fix some rare remote connection issues). Requires restart
translations.json.skiptocontent.help: Start playback of files at first motion event when possible
translations.json.sounddelay.help: Trigger an alert after sound detected (seconds)
translations.json.sourcetype.help: Select your source type. Click to configure it.
translations.json.speedlimits.help: Alerts will be generated for speeds outside of this range
translations.json.sslcert.help: Path to the certificate file eg: cert.p12
translations.json.sslonly.help: Accept only SSL requests (Test SSL is working first!)
translations.json.sslport2.help: Port to listen on for SSL connections (0 = disable).
translations.json.statictolerance.help: Percentage overlap to be considered static
translations.json.storageinterval.help: How often to run storage management (minutes)
translations.json.storagenotifyemail.help: Email address to send storage alerts to
translations.json.storagenotifyemailintervalhours.hel: How often to send storage warnings by email (hours)
translations.json.storagenotifyemaillimit.help: Send notification when storage over this limit (percent)
translations.json.storagerungc.help: Cleans up memory usage after storage management runs (advanced - only enable this if you are having memory usage issues)
translations.json.streamonload.help: Start streaming to this server when Agent DVR starts. Uses the last device streamed to the server
translations.json.stunservers.help: These servers help setup connections. Warning: Changing this may break local and remote access
translations.json.subject: Subject
translations.json.sunriseoffset.help: Time offset if using sunrise or sunset (minutes)
translations.json.suspendonmotiondetection.help: Suspends the schedule whilst the camera is detecting movement
translations.json.suspendonmove.help: Suspends the schedule if you manually control the PTZ (seconds)
translations.json.tagging.help: Agent DVR will send the frame with maximum motion to Google Vision for object recognition and tag your recordings with the results. See the Cloud tab in Server Settings to add a Google Vision API Key
translations.json.tagsrule.help: To apply to tag filtering, example: person AND vehicle, or person OR vehicle
translations.json.talkgain.help: Talk gain controls your outgoing voice volume
translations.json.tasksheader.help: Tasks to perform when this action is triggered
translations.json.time.help: local time at Agent DVR Server is {TIME}
translations.json.timeformats.help: Change and reload to update. See Formatting Dates eg: MMM DD YYYY h:mm:ss A
translations.json.timetype.help: For sunrise/ sunset, set a location on the General tab
translations.json.tracker.help: See the user guide for details
translations.json.trackingtimeout.help: Time to try to find lost objects (seconds)
translations.json.trackmaxobjects.help: Maximum number of objects to track
translations.json.trackstopdelay.help: Maximum time to track for before stopping (milliseconds)
translations.json.triggercolor.help: The color of the detection limit bars for audio
translations.json.triggertimeout.help: How long to record for after recording is triggered using the Trigger Recording action (s)
translations.json.triprepeat.help: Object can trigger a trip wire multiple times
translations.json.turnaddress.help: Public IP address of the server or leave blank for auto
translations.json.turnport.help: Port to run TURN server on. Changing this might break access
translations.json.turnserver.help: Start TURN server (Usually required for access)
translations.json.turnserverminport.help: Changes to TURN ports will restart the application
translations.json.urlreloadinterval.help: How often to reload the URL (s)
translations.json.usegpurecord.help: Use the GPU to encode - only applies if the stream is being encoded (not saving raw)
translations.json.usehdstream2.help: Requires recording mode to be set to Raw Record
translations.json.useinternaldecoder.help: If playback fails try using our alternate decoder instead
translations.json.userdownloads.help: User can download recordings (recordings could contain audio)
translations.json.userlimit2: Adding multiple users requires a license
translations.json.users3.help: Add local users and permissions here. For remote access permissions see the account menu permissions on the remote web portal. Requires a license. You can add one user account to the free version of Agent DVR.
translations.json.usesmtp.help: Required for email notifications if you don't have a remote access subscription
translations.json.usesnapshot: Use ONVIF snapshot URI for photos
translations.json.usesnapshoturi.help: Use an image from the snapshot URI instead of the live stream (see Photos)
translations.json.visionkey.help: Google Vision API Key - get one from https://cloud.google.com/vision/docs/auth
translations.json.vlcfilecache.help: Time to buffer in VLC. Reduce this to get a more realtime feed. (milliseconds)
translations.json.wanport.help: Set this if you have port forwarded Agent DVR
translations.json.webrtccodecdefault.help: Codec to use for streaming video to the UI
translations.json.whitelabelling3.help: Options to whitelabel Agent DVR (Requires white-label license)
translations.json.widthlimits.help: Upper and lower limits for detected objects
translations.json.willdelayinterval.help: Sends an offline message to the status topic after a delay (seconds, 0 to disable)
translations.json.withtags.help: Tags to filter on eg: dog,cat or person (optional). AI tags use the language in server settings.
translations.json.youtube.help: Due to licensing agreements we cannot auto upload to YouTube
translations.json.zone.help: Configure zones using the detector. Alert zones only apply to tracking detectors and the AI filter
translations.json.zonematch.help: Zones that generate alerts. Selected zones are BIG
translations.json.zones.help: Drag out zones to monitor. Live motion and trigger range is displayed at the bottom. Drag zones out to delete
translations.json.zoomoutdelay.help: Automatically zoom out to full view after zooming in (seconds), 0 = disable
translations.lpraiwarning: Configure LPR in Server Settings - AI Settings
translations.motion adaptive encode: Motion Adaptive Encode: Vary framerate by motion
translations.mqttdetectinstructions: To trigger motion detection on this device via MQTT pass in command: {COMMAND}
translations.ndierror: NDI not running. You may need to install it for your platform. See NDI ({ERROR})
translations.needonelayout: At least one layout is required
translations.onestoragelocation: You must have at least one storage location
translations.onlywindows: This plugin only works on Windows.
translations.onvifdiscoverywarning: Discovery is disabled in Server Settings
translations.ptzrepeattimelimit: Total scheduled time must be less than 24 hours
translations.ptzuseonvifwarning: For ONVIF PTZ you must use an ONVIF video source
translations.ptzuseonvifwarning2: Use ONVIF PTZ with an ONVIF video source
translations.pushactionhelp: Use Agent DVR app to receive push notifications
translations.pushchannel_help: Type of notification (applies to Android only)
translations.raw live: Raw Live Stream: Low CPU usage
translations.raw record: Raw Record Stream: Low CPU usage
translations.reasonbusinessnote2: As you have a perpetual license you can port forward this server or use a VPN and access it directly instead.
translations.reasonserialexpired: Your serial has expired. Please reconnect.
translations.reasontoomanyservers: Too many servers connected to this account.
translations.reasontrialexpired3: Your subscription has expired. See licensing for more information.
translations.reassignallcamerasmedia: Please reassign all cameras and microphones that are using this media directory first
translations.recordneedsencode: You may need to set the record mode to Encode for this camera if recordings don't play back
translations.subscribersonlyaitags: Can use {AI} for AI detected object. Subscribers Only
translations.unavailableremote: Unavailable. Check your internet connection or try again later.
translations.urlinvalid: The URL you entered is invalid
translations.useinactivityhelp: Resets the inactivity delay instead of stopping immediately
translations.voicelanguagehelp: Set language in server settings - General
